policies.name: Admin For Accessed Account Policy
policies.description: grant access only if user is admin for the accessed account

policies.name: Has Access To Account Policy
policies.description: grant access only if user has access to the account

policies.name: Token Type is User
policies.description: grant access only if the token is a user token

policies.name: Token Type is Device
policies.description: grant access only if the token is a device token

policies.name: Token Type Match Resource Endpoint And Access To Account Policy
policies.description: grant access only if token type matches with endpoint and user has access to the account

policies.name: Token Type Match Resource Endpoint And Admin For Accessed Account Policy
policies.description: grant access only if token type matches with endpoint and user is admin for the accessed account

mappers.name: get accounts that user has access
get gateway id for device access
mappers.description: gatewayId - only valid if access type is device
